text: The Kooks are a English rock band. They formed in Brighton in 2002. In July 2005 they released their first single, "Eddie's Gun". They are signed to Virgin Records. == Albums == * Inside In/Inside Out (2006) * Konk (2008) * Junk of the Heart (2011) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:British rock bands Category:Indie rock bands Category:2000s music groups
title: The Kooks
